highlights.description: Planet-style blog aggregator with JSON Feed 1.1 output designed for AI agents and human readers
Agent-friendly API structure with predictable URLs, schema.json, and AGENTS.md
Priority links for hand-curated content with discussion links and image pins

added.description: JSON Feed 1.1 specification types with Signal extensions (`_signal_feed_title`, `_signal_priority`, `_signal_discussions`, `_signal_source`)
Core entry types with deduplication, sorting, filtering, and JSON Feed conversion
OPML in JSON format for feed source management
Priority links package for hand-curated content with discussions (HackerNews, Reddit, Lobsters) and image pins
Monthly file splitting with merge mode to preserve historical entries
Feed aggregator with concurrent RSS/Atom fetching and progress reporting
Agent-friendly API generation with schema.json, AGENTS.md, and organized endpoints (by-month, by-source, by-tag)
Atom feed output generation for RSS reader compatibility
Cobra-based CLI with `aggregate` command supporting OPML input, priority links, monthly splitting, and API generation
Source platform metadata support for LinkedIn, Twitter, and other platforms
Discussion links support for HackerNews, Reddit, and Lobsters with score and comment counts
Image pins for visual content (LinkedIn posts, articles with hero images)

documentation.description: README with feature overview, usage examples, and architecture diagram

build.description: Go module with dependencies for RSS/Atom parsing and feed generation
GitHub Actions workflow for automated feed updates
